title: [新版本]二手市场等功能已上线并修复大量 bug， 请大家尽快更新~
title_en: [New version] The second-hand market and other functions have been launched and a large number of bugs have been fixed. Please update as soon as possible~
content: 请前往App Store / Play Store 下载更新
content_en: Please go to App Store / Play Store to download the update
